issue.title: Copy/Paste of a service and/or policy configuration
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

Administrator must have the possibility to do a copy/paste of a servie and/or policy configuration

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

it's already possible for a policy, it must be possible for a service configuration and its related policies
